testCases.title: videoEffectPickedInVideoApp - Success
testCases.expectedAlertValue: videoEffectPickedInVideoApp called with changeType: EffectChanged, effectId: dummyEffectId, effectParameter: undefined

testCases.title: videoEffectPickedInVideoApp with effect param - Success
testCases.expectedAlertValue: videoEffectPickedInVideoApp called with changeType: EffectChanged, effectId: dummyEffectId, effectParameter: dummyEffectParam

testCases.title: registerForVideoEffect - Handler - Success
testCases.expectedAlertValue: setVideoEffectAppliedResult called with isReady: true, effectId: nextEffectId, detail: undefined, effectParameter: undefined

testCases.title: registerForVideoEffect - Handler - Failed
testCases.expectedAlertValue: setVideoEffectAppliedResult called with isReady: false, effectId: anInvalidEffectId, detail: InvalidEffectId, effectParameter: undefined

testCases.title: videoEx.registerForVideoEffect - Handler - Success
testCases.expectedTestAppValue: video effect changed to "nextEffectId", effect param: "nextEffectParam"
testCases.expectedAlertValue: setVideoEffectAppliedResult called with isReady: true, effectId: nextEffectId, detail: undefined, effectParameter: nextEffectParam

testCases.title: videoEx.registerForVideoEffect - Handler - Failed
testCases.expectedTestAppValue: failed to change effect to "anInvalidEffectId", param: "anInvalidEffectParam"
testCases.expectedAlertValue: setVideoEffectAppliedResult called with isReady: false, effectId: anInvalidEffectId, detail: InvalidEffectId, effectParameter: anInvalidEffectParam

testCases.title: videoEx.NotifyFatalError - Success
testCases.expectedAlertValue: notifyError called with errorMessage: anError, errorLevel: fatal
